name: basic_pow_p1
formal_statement: theorem basic_pow_p1 (x : ℝ) (h : x > 0 ) (H : Real.sqrt x ≤ 1) : x ≤ 1 := by

name: basic_pow_p2
formal_statement: theorem basic_pow_p2 (x : ℝ) (h : x > 0 ) (H : x ^ ((3:ℝ )⁻¹) ≤ 1) : x ≤ 1 := by

name: test7
formal_statement: theorem test5 (x y : ℝ) (h : x > 0 ∧ y > 0) (H : (x * y) ^ ((3:ℝ )⁻¹) ≤ 1) : x * y ≤ 1 := by

name: test8
formal_statement: theorem test6 (x y: ℝ) (h : x > 0 ∧ y > 0) (H : Real.sqrt (x * y) ≤ 1) : x * y ≤ 1 := by

name: test10
formal_statement: theorem test10 (x y z w: ℝ) (h : x > 0 ∧ y > 0) (g : z > 0 ∧ w > 0) (H : Real.sqrt (x * y) ≤ 1) (G : Real.sqrt (z * 2) ≤ 1) : x * y * z * w ≤ 1 := by
